docs: Program module containing all instruction handlers

instructions.name: delegated_send_with_swap_v1
docs: Executes a delegated token swap using Jupiter and sends the resulting tokens to a receiver
This uses a delegate PDA to authorize the swap on behalf of the sender
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context containing all accounts needed for the delegated swap and transfer
* `amount` - The amount of tokens to swap
* `jupiter_shared_accounts_route_ix_data` - Instruction data for Jupiter's shared accounts route
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Result indicating success or failure

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender account that initiates the swap and transfer

accounts.name: input_token_account
docs: The sender's token account for the input token

accounts.name: send_with_swap_delegate
docs: The delegate PDA account that authorizes token transfers

accounts.name: input_intermediate_token_account
docs: The delegate's token account for the input token (intermediate account)

accounts.name: input_mint
docs: The mint of the input token

accounts.name: input_mint_program
docs: The token program for the input mint

accounts.name: output_intermediate_token_account
docs: The delegate's token account for the output token (intermediate account)

accounts.name: output_token_account
docs: The receiver's token account for the output token

accounts.name: output_mint
docs: The mint of the output token

accounts.name: output_mint_program
docs: The token program for the output mint

accounts.name: jupiter_program
docs: The Jupiter program that will execute the swap

instructions.name: init_send_with_swap_delegate_v1
docs: Initializes the delegate PDA account that will be used for delegated swaps
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context containing the delegate account to initialize
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Result indicating success or failure

accounts.name: send_with_swap_delegate
docs: The delegate PDA account that will be initialized
This account will be used to authorize token transfers on behalf of users

accounts.name: self_program_upgrade_authority
docs: The upgrade authority of the program, which must sign to initialize the delegate
This ensures only the program authority can create the delegate account

accounts.name: self_program_data
docs: The program data account containing information about the program's upgrade authority

accounts.name: self_program
docs: The program account itself, used to verify we're initializing for the correct program

accounts.name: system_program
docs: The system program used for creating the delegate account

instructions.name: send_with_swap_v1
docs: Executes a token swap using Jupiter and sends the resulting tokens to a receiver
# Arguments
* `ctx` - The context containing all accounts needed for the swap and transfer
* `jupiter_shared_accounts_route_ix_data` - Instruction data for Jupiter's shared accounts route
# Returns
* `Result<()>` - Result indicating success or failure

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender account that initiates the swap and transfer

accounts.name: input_token_account
docs: The sender's token account for the input token

accounts.name: input_mint
docs: The mint of the input token

accounts.name: input_mint_program
docs: The token program for the input mint

accounts.name: output_intermediate_token_account
docs: The sender's token account for the output token (intermediate account before transfer to receiver)

accounts.name: output_token_account
docs: The receiver's token account for the output token

accounts.name: output_mint
docs: The mint of the output token

accounts.name: output_mint_program
docs: The token program for the output mint

accounts.name: jupiter_program
docs: The Jupiter program that will execute the swap

types.name: SendWithSwapDelegateV1
docs: The delegate account that authorizes token transfers on behalf of users
when performing delegated swaps through Jupiter.
This is a PDA derived using the SEND_WITH_SWAP_DELEGATE seed.

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump seed used in the PDA derivation

fields.name: version
docs: The version of the account structure, currently set to 1

constants.name: SEND_WITH_SWAP_DELEGATE
docs: Seed used for deriving the PDA address of the send-with-swap delegate account.
This delegate account is used to authorize token transfers on behalf of users
when performing delegated swaps through Jupiter.
